DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Returns the domain separator used in the encoding of the signature for {permit}, as defined by {EIP712}.

params.owner: The address of the owner of the tokens
params.spender: The address wanting to spend tokens

returns.success: Whether or not the call succeeded.

params.owner: The address whose token is allowed.

returns.remaining: The amount of token `spender` is allowed to transfer on behalf of `owner`.

params.spender: The address to be given rights to transfer.

returns.success: Whether or not the call succeeded.

params.owner: The address whose token is allowed.
params.spender: The address to be given rights to transfer.

returns.success: Whether or not the call succeeded.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

params.amount: The number of tokens to burn.
The number of tokens to burn.
params.from: The address whose token to burn.

params.deadline: The deadline for granting permission to the spender
params.owner: The owner of the ERC20 tokens
params.spender: The nominated spender of the ERC20 tokens
params.value: The value (allowance) of the ERC20 tokens that the nominated spender will be allowed to spend

returns.values: An array of values representing the "level" of each gem. ie: Power=14, speed=45, etc...

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

returns._0: The name of the token collection.

nonces(address).details: Returns the current nonce for `owner`. This value must be included whenever a signature is generated for {permit}. Every successful call to {permit} increases ``owner``'s nonce by one. This prevents a signature from being used multiple times.

params.deadline: The deadline for granting permission to the spender
params.owner: The owner of the ERC20 tokens
params.spender: The nominated spender of the ERC20 tokens
params.value: The value (allowance) of the ERC20 tokens that the nominated spender will be allowed to spend

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

returns._0: The symbol of the token collection.
The total number of tokens in existence.

params.amount: The number of tokens being transfered.
params.to: The recipient address of the tokens being transfered.

returns.success: Whether or not the transfer succeeded.

params._data: The extra data to be passed to the receiving contract.

params.from: The origin address  of the tokens being transferred.
params.to: The recipient address of the tokensbeing  transfered.

returns.success: Whether or not the transfer succeeded.

Approval(address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when owner grant transfer rights to another address

Transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when tokens are transfered from one address to another.

addAllowanceIfNeeded(address,address,uin.notice: Increase the allowance for the spender if needed

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the allowance of `spender` for `owner`'s tokens.

changeAttributes(address).notice: Used by Admin to update the attributes contract.

checkApproveFor(address,address,uint256,.notice: Function to permit the expenditure of ERC20 token by a nominated spender

decimals().notice: Get the number of decimals for the token collection.

getAttributes(uint256,(uint16[],bytes32).notice: Get the attributes for each gem in an asset. See DefaultAttributes.getAttributes for more.

getMaxGems().notice: Get the value of _maxGems(the max number of gems that can be embeded in this type of catalyst).

name().notice: Get the name of the token collection.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Function to permit the expenditure of ERC20 token by a nominated spender

symbol().notice: Get the symbol for the token collection.

totalSupply().notice: Get the total number of tokens in existence.

transferAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Transfers tokens to an address with _data if the recipient is a contact.
